title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-4.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-4.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to set forth methods and controls to restrict dissemination and maintain control of confidential personal health related information within the Department of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
50-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
